dataComment.description: This is an export of your Goodmoves account data. In the stored data, vacancies are only referenced by their unique ID. You can use the `vacancyLookup` field included in this export to find details on any vacancy currently stored within our system.
This is all the information stored about you for the purposes of authentication and other information you have chosen to save such as shortlisted vacancies, saved searches, and notes.

providerData.dataComment: Each account can be linked to one or more authentication provider (email/password, Google, Facebook, Twitter), this is the information we store in relation to each authentication provider.

dataComment.description: A list of vacancy IDs with any notes you may have stored against them. See the `vacancyLookup` field for information about each vacancy ID
A list of all your shortlisted vacancies. See the `vacancyLookup` field for information about each vacancy ID
dataComment.location: On a Google Cloud Platorm MySQL database located at 'europe-west2-c' (London). For more information visit https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/

dataComment.description: A list of all your saved searches.
dataComment.location: On a Google Cloud Platorm MySQL database located at 'europe-west2-c' (London). For more information visit https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/

dataComment.description: Here is a list of (up to) the last 10 vacancies you have viewed.
dataComment.location: Your browser cookies allow our web servers to read this information. These servers are located at 'europe-west2-c' (London). For more information visit https://cloud.google.com/computer/docs/regions-zones/

dataComment.description: Use this list to find details about vacancies that appear in your notes, shortlist, and recently viewed lists. Please note that if a vacancy is no longer in our search index, it will not appear in this list.
dataComment.location: In an Elasticsearch index located at 'europe-west3' (Frankfurt). For more information visit https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/. It should be noted that only data controlled by Goodmoves is stored at this location and no user data is ever transferred there.
